lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and so I want to help other however I can.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: 25 dollars goes a long way!

lender.name: The Andrea Family
lender.loan_because: poverty doesn't need to happen - there is plenty for all.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student (studying nursing)and a mother and Brendan is a software engineer

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: Its such an easy thing to do, to help someone across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am an animal doctor in a small country town.

lender.name: Thomas & Mette
lender.loan_because: We have never believed in just giving money to someone. Lend them the money and they will feel a greater responsibility. We want to help the women, they need a break. Besides... in africa the men have been in charge for 50 years, with little luck. Time to let the women have a go at it :-)
lender.occupational_info: Thomas is in charge of the servers that run the Copenhagen City (Capital of Denmark and host of the COP15 summit) website. Mette is a distribution manager in the danish postal service.

lender.name: Niels & Petra
lender.loan_because: Sometimes we all need some extra money to make the next step...

lender.name: Milus
lender.loan_because: So many people are in need of just a little help to make a living.
lender.occupational_info: Ever since I joined Kiva in July 2008, I've been able to reinvest my original donation multiple times. It just goes on and on and on... due to the effort of these hard working entrepreneurs and, of course, the Kiva staff. During 2012 I will keep donating in their honour.

lender.name: Yuko
lender.loan_because: it is wonderful that I can be of help to people who are working hard on the other side of the globe.

lender.name: Mario
lender.loan_because: Solidarity is investing in the future of our children. Solidarity creates a secure human enviroment.
lender.occupational_info: I manage several projects for western companies and privates in China and South America.

lender.name: Carol & Dave
lender.loan_because: It's the absolute best use of $25 I can think of :).

lender.name: Silke and AGG
lender.loan_because: We are a peer-group (gender equality) and work together in Hannover. We want to give other groups a chance - especially women - to build up their business.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I want to help others and give a little back.

lender.name: M. Diane Rogers
lender.loan_because: I believe we can each make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Usually I am helping others learn about their family history. Very satisfying.

lender.name: Geoffrey
lender.loan_because: Many people have helped me in my life. In turn, I need to take every opportunity to do the same for others. Loaning money in this way is easy and rewarding.

lender.name: Shawna
lender.loan_because: I would like to connect with women and men around the globe and learn their stories and hear about their success. I am interested in helping other women who sew or make things. I visted Guatemala in 1992 with Habitat for Humanity while I was in college and had wonderful experiences and met beautiful, happy people. They all had very little material goods and were the most generous people I've ever met.
lender.occupational_info: I design rooms and also sew, build and paint. I like to work with my hands building and creating beautiful interiors.

lender.name: Monique
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great way to help people improve their lives themselves.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I believe together we can help ordinary people like ourselves who simply need a chance. I want to help give them that chance if at all possible.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a sailor in the U.S. Navy. I do a lot of research and analytical work as I travel.

lender.name: Temu, A.B.S
lender.loan_because: This is my small contribution to social enterprising, with particular interest to projects in Africa. There are enough resources including finances in this world to facilitate enough projects to create sustainable growth and wealth. There isn't enough grass roots people organizations to facilitate knowledge seeking, acquiring, sharing topped with appropriate timely actions on knowledge acquired - well organized to adequately utilize and access relevant resources. Kiva contributes as a Platform working towards creating a world without Poverty. A noble cause, many of us will attempt to associate ourselves with.
lender.occupational_info: Strong passion on the use of technology towards any efforts attributing to wealth and value creation and grassroots empowerment through knowledge sharing/dissemination & cooperation.

lender.name: Jeff David
lender.loan_because: I never had to want for anything... so this is my way of paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an ISO standards auditor.

lender.name: Maya
lender.loan_because: I was given a Kiva gift certificate for my high school graduation, and I am excited to begin making contributions. This micro-loan organization is a wonderful cause, and I look forward to helping those in need all across the globe.

lender.name: Susan Reid
lender.loan_because: Some debts you can't pay off, so you pay them forward.
lender.occupational_info: I design websites and print materials for people starting their own businesses.

lender.name: Haley
lender.loan_because: I believe that individuals can make a difference.

lender.name: ker
lender.loan_because: i have a social consciousness and i am aware of the fact that i was lucky to be born in a richer part of the world.

lender.name: Stacy & Dan
lender.loan_because: We enjoy giving, and helping; it brings us great happiness to help others achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: We are professional writers, working in partnership, specializing in writing stories to be made into Hollywood movies. We love what we do, and feel blessed that we get to work together as husband and wife.

lender.name: K Gill
lender.loan_because: We are all human, and all deserve the chance to build a life free from poverty, hunger, and fear.
lender.occupational_info: I help developmentally disabled children make the most of their educational opportunities.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: it's a very small way that I can help fellow humans navigate life on this planet.
lender.occupational_info: I work with students ages 5-11 who are struggling to learn to read English.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people to make their dreams come true!
lender.occupational_info: I work in the convention and visitors bureau industry on the development side.

lender.name: Kieran
lender.loan_because: everybody deserves opportunities, but unfortunately not everyone gets them

lender.name: Arthur
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing others have an opportunity to succeed.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It's great to help people help themselves, their families, and communities. I admire the hard work and determination it takes for people to make their business grow!

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: these micro loans provide an advantage to people they wouldn't otherwise have. I'm happy to be able to help others in need.

lender.name: One Planet Catering
lender.loan_because: We feel privileged to be doing the things we love by having the freedom and opportunities in which to do them, that's why 5% of our revenue will go to the two things that need the same opportunities to flourish and grow - people and our planet. In our communities, we're excited about the vegetable roots that will grow in the gardens of preschools and elementary schools while establishing roots for healthy eating habits in children and our school systems. We also look forward to support micro-financing opportunities in developing nations through KIVA
lender.occupational_info: ONE PLANET CATERING is the leading environmental and social responsible catering company in Vancouver with the primary focus on serving lunch to people at work. We encourage our customers to make positive choices for their wellbeing and the environment, at the same time provide them with information on nutrition and current food-related/ environmental issues. By delivering natural, organic lunches, we increase our customers' health, energy and productivity.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Kiva feels like a good way to do something positive.
lender.occupational_info: I am self-employed and write for advertising agencies, mostly for Web sites, but also anything else a business might need (like brochures or print ads). I usually just tell people I "rearrange the alphabet." For my own pleasure I write fiction and poetry.

lender.name: Nanci and Jeff
lender.loan_because: My son gave me the gift of giving
lender.occupational_info: I help families that are dealing with disabilities find the services they need and advocate for them along the way.

lender.name: Cat
lender.loan_because: It's exciting to reach out to people from all over the world and to help to make a positive impact on their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I provide technical support to the Accounts Payable department of a large media company and help to make sure that our photographers and filmmakers get paid correctly.

lender.name: Allisa
lender.loan_because: I will make a difference.

lender.name: ambear
lender.loan_because: It seems like a good way to spread the good fortune around
lender.occupational_info: I like to help

lender.name: Maike
lender.loan_because: I always wanted to change the world into a better one. Sometimes little steps are better than bigger!

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I want to be the change I hope to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I study how salt and heat get mixed in the ocean.

lender.name: Helge
lender.loan_because: If lending money is all it takes, to improve some individual's live in a region, where this money has a much higher value, then I will gladly do just that. :-)
lender.occupational_info: The german tax system grows more and more complicated. So people and companies need tax advisors to help them find through.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I believe it can make a difference.

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance as an avenue through which global citizens can be empowered to emerge from poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a liaison between Kiva lenders and entrepreneurs in Togo who receive loans through Women and Associations for Gain both Economic and Social (WAGES).

lender.occupational_info: I fly aircraft to transport people to destinations in North America, Central America and the Caribbean.

lender.loan_because: It is the only way to cure poverty
lender.occupational_info: I am a independant businessman who is active in my town. The only way to lead a meanigful life is to lead a meaningful life.

lender.loan_because: microcredit fits into my ideals of benevolence and a web-based donation system gives me sufficient distance from the people I'm lending to so that I don't feel like an egotistical money-lender.
lender.occupational_info: I create computer software for one of Singapore's government agencies.

lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to.

lender.occupational_info: Support the managers and employees in personal and organisational development, recruitment and around their problems during the work.

lender.occupational_info: I am working in a pharmaceutical company on scientific information about homeopathic medicines for the purpose of marketing authorization.

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.loan_because: I feel that giving freely is the truest expression of the human soul.
lender.occupational_info: SPARSE! When I'm working, which isn't steady, I'm a sound and video engineer for NY network television. If you can see it and hear it, there's someone like me providing that quality video and sound.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: This loan is in honor of my mother Elizabeth Kwiker (pictured). She had a generous spirit and loved to help others. She traveled through Asia and loved the kind people and beatiful countries.

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who want to help themselves and who believe, as I do, in hard work, determination and their ability to make things happen. I am happy to help in my small way to give them a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I make beaded jewelry and sell it at shows and markets in the eastern US.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: there is a need

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I believe that people want to provide for themselves and I loan because it is an opportunity to remove financial barriers that can help them to achieve indepedence.
lender.occupational_info: I teach nursing students in a large university in Southern California, USA.

lender.name: Carrie

lender.name: Naveen
lender.loan_because: I want to help others

lender.loan_because: To make a difference.

lender.name: Alison and Mike
lender.loan_because: This makes me feel like I'm connecting with people more directly. I'm helping a neighbor.
lender.occupational_info: I have a store where I sell furniture and help my customers make beautiful homes to live in. My parents started the business 40 years ago and I have run it for almost 30 years. We are a small family business of 6 employees including myself and my husband.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps!

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: I believe in people helping people.

lender.loan_because: I want to provide direct assistance to hard working people in need who can experience empowerment through their own efforts and a helping hand or two.

lender.occupational_info: I don't feel like I make an impact. It's a job.

lender.loan_because: After a white light experiance. I learn that the world is just one of many worlds and giving is pleasing to the white light. You grow more in giving and it sets you free from the concept of " it mine. ".
lender.occupational_info: alll types of famous faces of people that help me be in the white light. They warm my heart and mind.When I had nothing. People keep me alive.

lender.loan_because: Everyone with the capacity to work should have the capital to make it work!

lender.occupational_info: Trilingual Interpreter: ASL/English/Spanish

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can, and because doing so is the right thing. We all win if we can improve the lives of those around us.
lender.occupational_info: I am a software consultant. Specifically, I help others with Microsoft Excel issues.

lender.loan_because: An amazing way to contribute to another persons life.
lender.occupational_info: I love my work, each day in the youngest class we spend time learning and playing with lots of hugs and laughter. A great way for a child to start school.

lender.name: Susan, Jessie & Kirby

lender.occupational_info: Susan- teacher. Jessie- university student. Kirby- university student

lender.loan_because: I can make a difference...one loan at a time!

lender.name: Sherry and Fred
lender.loan_because: We have been lucky to have been born in places and at times which have given us a fortunate life. Hopefully we can help people who are in need to have an opportunity to improve their lives and the lives of their families.
lender.occupational_info: Sherry works selling Asian furniture in South Carolina, USA and Fred works in Beijing, China.

lender.name: Leo
lender.loan_because: it directly helps people who otherwise wouldn't be able to raise the money they need to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I dispense medicine and give advice about medicine.

lender.name: Nilan & Kimberly
lender.loan_because: To help make a difference in some way

lender.name: Ricky
lender.loan_because: This is a great way for small businesses to raise funds without finding themselves at the mercy of the world's greedy banking sector.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the importing business, clearing cargo through the Australian Customs Service and making it available to importers within Australia. This is a picture of me with my wife Eilin and baby Dominic.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It gives me the opportunity to help someone who needs and appreciates it. It also creates the possibility of ongoing value creation where each of the individuals I lend to can pass on opportunities to those in their families and communities...
lender.occupational_info: I am a architect of possibility and potential. Creating a safe and soulful place for conversation by playfully unleashing the untapped power and capability of ourselves and our relationships.

lender.name: Stu Thompson
lender.loan_because: Two reasons: 1) People can do more for themselves, given the opertunity, than anyone else. 2) The world works better when finance/lending is considered a utility (like electricity) and easily available.
lender.occupational_info: I program computers and the Internet

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I believe that every entrepreneur should have access to finance, and with it the chance to grow their business, support their family, and educate their children. The success of entrepreneurs like we have on Kiva can gradually increase a whole country's standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: Sporting events management

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: cause I can

lender.name: Trisha
lender.loan_because: "Give a man a fish; you have fed him for today. Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime" - I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I have been successful due to the loans that have been given to me over the years. I would like to continue that tradition.

lender.name: Auleen
lender.loan_because: I believe in global connectedness- we are all in this together!
lender.occupational_info: In my professional life I help companies, governments and non profit organizations with their marketing activities. In my personal life I have a wonderful husband and two great kids and I love to read, travel and meet people.

lender.name: Pamela and Amelia
lender.loan_because: A person should have the opportunity to take care of themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: While raising a healthy daughter, I work in health care to help of low income, elderly and disabled people get care. I am a nurse.

lender.loan_because: I've been hoping to be a little help for Africa and in search of the effective way for it.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the bank and deal with export documents.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: After hearing about Kiva on NPR, I realized how great an idea Kiva had.
lender.occupational_info: I help design roads and review plans.

lender.name: Jasmine
lender.loan_because: It's the spirit of helping and caring for the well-being of our fellow humans in this world.

lender.name: Marcin
lender.loan_because: I live in London but come from Poland. I am a Christian and want to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I am maintaining databases that are used by internet websites.

lender.name: UNSECURED LOAN SERVICES
lender.loan_because: No Documents or Collateral Required No Assets Quick and Easy App Process 10k - 150k Unsecured 24/72-Hour Approvals 7 to 10-Day Funding

lender.name: Beate
lender.loan_because: I can. Its great to help people in this way.
lender.occupational_info: Im working at an emergency telephone centre.

lender.name: Tim Tuff
lender.loan_because: I believe the world's problems are best solved from the bottom-up. I believe Kiva empowers us to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because:
I have no other opportunities. Here is the long story in a short version:
When I was 15 I woke up one morning at my Girlfriend, at that time, and I had this strange feeling inside, wondering what it was, I walked over to the window, it was summer and my Girlfriend was still a sleep in the bed. I'll never forget this feeling in my stomach, this weird, unknown, new and very disturbing feeling.
Now, before I go any further, I know what some may think, that this is a nice little sad story I'm making up so I can get people to loan me the money, but no, it is not! I can absolutely guarantee you that it is not, I can even get medical papers and bank papers and so on, confirming all of it in hard facts, at least showing that it really happened and so forth!
But back to my story, the story of my life, I've told it like a million times.
There I was, that morning, only 15 years old, not knowing what was happening inside of me, just that something was going on, something not quite right. But as the days went by and I kept feeling this way, I realized that it wasn't going to go away on its own, it was there to stay and it made me so depressed, unsecure and I felt like shit, unworthy to live, had no desire to live!!! But what the hell was this feeling?
I am born and raised in a small town in Denmark. A small town, where people know everybody, here you don't show your weakness, where you don't talk about your feelings. So as a young boy aged 15-16 years, I had a very difficult time dealing with this new feeling, not knowing what to do, whom to tell, where to go.
The summer vacation was over and I was going to new school with a lot of people I didn't know, with this feeling inside, I just felt so ashamed of it, not knowing what it was, I had hided it inside of me, hadn't talked to anyone about it, because I thought it would go away on its own, but no. So I went on, and it was eating me up, things not being dealt with have a tendency to go in some very wrong directions. And oh boy was I heading in one hell of a wrong direction:
After almost 4-5 month at the new school I had made a lot of trouble, because I wasn't feeling happy inside and I could just feel this weird, wrong, depressing feeling and that made me do foolish boy pranks, which was interpetated like simple, but not acceptable boy pranks, when it indeed was about a boy who was feeling like he was going to die, insane, weird and on the brink of wanting to die! I've wished myself dead at least a 100 times, at least!
How do you explain to someone, that you have this weird feeling inside, that makes you feel insane, that makes you confused and totally unsecure, that brings you down, not even knowing why or being able to connect it to anything AT ALL! Just overnight, that summer morning?
So I didn't know at all how to talk or tell anyone about it, I felt to ashamed and no adults took me by the arm and really took an upright interest in me as a human being worth saving, so the teachers just gave me a choice, either get your shit together or leave this school!
I left, as I have left a 100 other times since then, because of that feeling! That fucking unknown shitty feeling, eating me up inside! Making my personality totally different!
I found out, that this feeling was coming and going, without a pattern. But it became very clear, that the feeling or as I like to call it, the condition, was dominating me at all times, there wasn't one night or day, where I wasn't thinking about it, it became my life. Avoid being seen, because I had this feeling, which made me low, depressed, gave me a feeling of not being myself, felt insane, couldn't feel anything, wanted to die, couldn't think very clear, all those effects of the condition made me hide, how or what would you do, if you felt like there was something unknown, an unexplained condition dominating you, making you feel like this and you had found out, that it didn't go away on its own, it just kept on coming in different degrees and without a pattern or a real reason, would you feel ashamed of yourself? Would you hide yourself, because how could you be social and feeling like this at the same time!?
So I hid myself away, from everybody! Even my family!
It was about 1 year since I woke up that morning, with that condition. I felt like I had to try and talk to my parents, so I (16 years old) I told my parents one day, that I had something I needed to tell them and that I would like it if they would come with me into the living room and hear what I had to say! So we sat down and I could see in their eyes, that they were a little afraid of the whole situation, like there was something serious wrong. So I told them how I felt, it was very hard and I didn't feel comfortable in the situation at all, hence the condition and all was there and affecting me! My mom's reaction was "Is this really something you mean, do YOU REALLY!!!! MEAN IT? It made me sad and afraid, that my mom would react like that, my own parents, that are supposed to back me up and help me and worst of all, my dad just sad there, looking out into the thin air. So I felt even more unsecure about myself and said to my parents, that it was probably just me and my mind, just a teenage thing, thou I knew it wasn't, because I felt like shit, I wanted to die, I had never felt that bad in my entire life! NEVER! My parents didn't even ask me afterwards about that day or how I felt, it made me furious and from that day on I was going to make it on my own!
So nothing happened. Later on I found out, that my dad's mom, my grandmother had cancer and that he had just gotten message about she wasn't going to beat the cancer. That's why he didn't say anything that day. And my mom was defending my dad, or was to stressed out because of the cancer situation, that she reacted that way. I also found out they owed quite a lot for the house and that it was tuff times. Phew =) It's a long story and I just wanted to tell the short version.
The condition went on, I kept hiding myself, floating away from my own true me and began to put a mask on, at every event, in every social situation I pretended like I was okay and so on, although I wanted to die and I hadn't talked to anybody about this feeling/condition for almost 1 year at this time in the story.
Time had come where I had to decide what I was going to do, study or work. I just wanted to die! I felt like the whole world had chosen me and just wanted me to kill myself, because why would anybody, without a reason, want to do this to somebody who was happy and loved life from before that morning aged 15?
So I did what all my friends did or what most of them did, I went to business school, 3 year education. Today it is mystery how I managed those years, because never had I had a harder time, than those 3 years. It was a very troublesome time and I completely lost my identity and the Jacob I used to be was gone. I was now a hollow actor, a living dead walking around and trying not to be seen! It was a living hell! At my third year, I had a my final big project and I decided to write about depression, because I thought that was it! I wanted people to read it and ask me about how I felt, but no one did I even wrote in it, that I thought I had a depression and I asked my parents to read it. They did, but they didn't even ask me about anything or commented on it. I was petrified!!!
I barely made the examines and I got through those 3 years with a very bad grade on my papers. But I did learn some and that has helped me in my life!
The years went by and the condition was still there, the acting was still there, the wanting to die was still there! Nothing had changed, oh, yeah, one thing had changed, I had almost accepted the condition and decided to live with it, like that, be miserable, sad and wanting to die, yes, I didn't see any other way.. When not even my own parents wanted to see or hear me, even help me, I couldn't see any way out!
So as amazing as it may seem, I went through ca. 7 years with that condition, without talking to anyone, yeah, I talked to 1 girlfriend about it, but she was the girlfriend I had back that morning, when I woke up and the feeling was there. I lost her because of that condition and all my friends back then and I would even say I lost my own family, because they ignored me. I just sad by the diner table for 7 years, eating, listening to my mom, dad and brother talking, not seeing what condition I was in, not saying or asking if I was okay, not even once!!!!!!!!!!!! I wouldn't want to wish even my worst or most hated enemy to experience 7 years like that, I have NO IDEA how I made it! Do we have a choice, we have to live or else we have to take our own life and I could never do that, since I knew how good life could be!!
At my 7th year into the condition I was really at an edged, I had moved to Denmark's second biggest city Arhus, I believe you know the capital Copenhagen? And I was going to study computer programming for 2 years and get an education. But I didn't want to do that, I just applied for the education so no one would see me, so they wouldn't see my condition, because they didn't help me or say anything, thou they could see how I was every day, I think they may have turned the blind eye or was to afraid to act on something that serious. Which is worst, I don't know. People turning the blind eye seeing and knowing how bad and sick I was or not seeing me at all, because, well, because what do I know? Because they didn't really see me, or cared about my life and well being.
To make the story even shorter, I started at the computer programming school, but had to drop out, because the condition/feeling was eating me up! After that day I went to see my doctor in rhus, for the first time in 7 years living with that all-dominating condition I went to a doctor to do something about it, to find out, I was at the brink of suicide and I was willing to do anything. It was a very bad doctor and he just gave me some pills and said that everything was going to be okay. In my condition I would do anything, I hadn't done anything for 7 years, so I took the pills. They made me feel like shit and a zombie. I went to the officials and made them help me, they put me on welfare and wanted me to get into treatment. so I did!
I went off the pills after a year and in the meantime I had met a girl, I thought she was the sweetest girl ever, I thought she wanted to do what was best for me, but instead she lied to me and said the had a lot of money, that she had this and that, I didn't care, just as long as we loved each other. It ended after 2 years of lies and me believing in her lies, it was so hard, and the condition/feeling was STILL THERE! I went to a psychiatrist, but because of that girlfriend it didn't go through, I just stayed away, because the girlfriend had lied about her money and made me sign a loan, she said that her lawyer would pay her the money later on, when she was old enough to receive her heritage, 2 millions. I belived her, if you do not belive in your partner, then what do you have? When all is left, all we have are each other, common sense and so on, but she was a master at lies, she manipulated me and my sickness.
The relationship ended and because of her I now owed 12500 dollars to my bank, and I had gotten absolutely nothing for those money. I just couldn't believe it! Before I met this deceiving and disturbing young woman, I had send a letter to my parents explain how mad and disappointed I was over their behavior over the last 7 years.
8 years had passed and I wrote to them that I didn't want to talk or see them for some while! They had never helped me or even asked me. They had a mental breakdown and went to see a psychiatrist themselves. I didn't see or exchange even 1 word with them for 8 month and then I decided that it was time to put the past behind me and try to look forward, no good would come of not talking to them.
So here I am, 10 years later, aged 25. Still fighting that very same feeling/condition from that morning. Not knowing what it is, but this time I got one hell of a lot of experience with us human beings, I have used the last 10 years in the school of life, observing how we treat each other and how miserable a lot of us are. It is a very sad sight and not for the fainted hearted. So in one way you can say, that it has given me an awareness like no one else and a knowledge about a lot of things, that "normal" people don't have, because they have been living in the life, while I was participating, acting, and quietly observing from within.
I used a lot of those years ordering online, reading a lot about technology and the development. I know a lot about this and that's why I came to this place, because I need start capital for my very own webshop, where I will be selling electronical goods to the whole wide world, quality at low prices, I want to break the market and fill out the gaps that are there, suit the needs of consumers, that I have experienced needs it. So I am hoping, that you will realize and see that I am very well for real, I have the purest intentions and I would give my right arm to have my first success in 10 years, still fighting this feeling/condition. I have come a long way, but I still don't know what it is and it is killing me, so I am VERY excited about this time I have at the psychiatrist in August. That is the first time in aprox 2 years since I was with that girl who lied and made the last, and at that time, first visit with a psychiatrist go wrong and out in the sand.
So I beg of you, trust me, and I will pay you back with interest! Ask me about everything you want and I will try and answer you at best will! If you do not trust me or believe that this is the story of my life, well, then I feel sorry for you. If we do not trust in each other and in life, then we have no fundament here in life, it all depends on corporation and other people! Together we can do everything, alone we will die and parish, its as simple as that!
All my best wishes to everybody out there =)
lender.occupational_info: I am developing ideas and are a very creative person. Right now I am trying to find the money to make the webshop I have been planning and working on for ages. If I could find the capital for this, it would change my life and I have had one hell of a life!

lender.occupational_info: I'm 25 years old, italian girl, still studying and also working in an hotel as conference and sales department employee

lender.loan_because: Every person has the right to help themselves

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because:
I truly believe in giving back! Everyone deserves the opportunity to live their passion and dreams.
I wish everyone the best! Smile and make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a licensed hairstylist, who has worked in and outside of the U.S. I cut/color and style hair. My job is very rewarding! To see the difference and change I can make within A person's life is Amazing!

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: Life itself is a sacrifice.
lender.occupational_info: I trade on natural herbs that cures different kinds of infections/diseases and i also run a small poultry farm down my locality here.

lender.name: Mandy
lender.loan_because: I can afford to and I consider that a privilege.
lender.occupational_info: I study world languages and cultures to gain better understanding of our diverse languages and cultures.

lender.name: Bob Stein
lender.loan_because:
I loan because ... I don't qualify to borrow? I can't say exactly why I'm here. I do intend to make up a good reason eventually. I feel much the same about life, since my application to incarnate as a stormy petrel was denied. Sorry, should I be taking this space more seriously? I guess I have *that* problem in life too.
Since I came to kiva I feel a little less overwhelmed, help my friends and family a little more, waste less, whine less.
I look for projects with more production than reselling, and lower-interest lenders. I notice a recurring food theme, I wonder if I was hungry when I picked those.
You may wonder why most of the people in the pictures below are smiling, while my picture on the left, not so much. You might think this is because kiva has taken my money and given it to them. And you would have a point. Except the pictures were all taken before that happened. I like to believe it's because they are cuter when they smile.
lender.occupational_info: I write, print, and sell cheat-sheets and posters for web designers in 92 countries so far. I have four kids, ages 13-22. Sometimes they help, but each day it seems they want more money and can run faster.

lender.name: Laura and Jamison
lender.loan_because: We want to help many people's lives and give them the opportunity to make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Kindergarten teacher in a public school in NYC. My husband is a veterinarian at an emergency animal hospital in NJ.

lender.name: Bobby
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I build oilwell equipment and send it all over the world

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I feel that it's important to help other people to get started with their life because you never know someday you might be in the same position and need this loan to get you started as well.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student. Honestly, my job title is student but I babysit all the time so that's my income.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because:
"The message I would leave . . . is We can and we've got to do better than this." - Ted Geisel
It's a small thing on my end that can possibly help someone else so much.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I want to support someone else's dream of success or a fresh start.
lender.occupational_info: I help people realize their dream of home ownership!

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: Putting my money to use sharing in sustainable projects around the world seems like the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I have two jobs: As an urban planner, I work with others to make cities better. I also translate from French to English.

lender.name: Martin & Allison
lender.loan_because:
I am also in the army reserves in Canada and went to Afghanistan in 2005. I met at least one of the loan partners (Ariana, I think) while I was there and saw how micro loans worked.
The one loan we have made was made for us by a friend as a wedding gift. We will continue to loan more now that we have seen how this works.
lender.occupational_info: My wife Allison and I are Investment advisors. We help people manage any extra money they have by recommending investments to them in the hopes that they will get their money back later with interest. I am also an army reservist and have served in Afghanistan. I have seen first hand how micro loans work.

lender.loan_because: I can make a small difference.
lender.occupational_info: Olympics

lender.name: Jessica Lays
lender.loan_because: I am concerned about problems associated with poverty and microcredit is a great way to help the entrepreneurial poor.
lender.occupational_info: Making a difference!

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I think that everyone in the world should get a chance to start a business.

lender.name: Katherina (Tina)
lender.loan_because: Someone took a chance on me and I want to share my good fortune
lender.occupational_info: I help make my city beautiful by planting and tending flowers and shrubs. I also grow food for my family.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: How can I not?
lender.occupational_info: I provide anesthesia to people needing surgery. I've also done volunteer anesthesia for 4 different groups repairing cleft lips and palates in 6 countries Latin America, the Middle East and Siberia.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a wonderful life.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a Portland business unit of a Fortune 500 public company.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: We are all connected... and without the generosity of others, I would not be where I am today.
lender.occupational_info: I help develop new medications, drugs and vaccines.

lender.name: Alena
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to be a struggling crank in the chain, but the difference being that we in the US and other developed countries make a bit more money than 3rd world nations, so I feel like if I can make even a small difference in someone's life then I am happy to do what I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a gardener. I take care of other people's yards by weeding, pruning trees, and adding new plants as well as general maintenance

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: * I care * I want to do what I can to help * Excellent way to help those in need without creating unhealthy dependancies
lender.occupational_info: I own a very small business. With this business, I use a computer and telephone at my home to answer telephone calls for other businesses. Currently, phone calls include insurance accident reports for auto/ home and etcetera .

lender.name: Kayla
lender.loan_because: It puts life in perspective. No matter how many bills pile up the happiness of seeing someone being able to fulfill thier dreams with the amount I might spend on one dinner out makes me know that nothing about my life is bad.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 25 year old with a certification as a technician caring for patients eyes.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Being a small business owner has been good for me and I hope it can be good for others too.

lender.name: Falko
lender.loan_because: I have been to Southeast Asia a couple of times and I want to give something back for the hospitality and friendship I received during my stays
lender.occupational_info: 60% Office (reports, organisation) 40% Field work (sampling, drilling) Basically I'm working on Environmental Site Assessments, groundwater and brownfield remediations

lender.loan_because: I am able.

lender.occupational_info: Colin trades options on the US stock market as well as foreign exchange, and teaches courses to others on how to do it. Ann teaches academic english to overseas students planning on studying in Australia.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a fair shot at life, no matter what circumstances they're given. Because one person can cause a ripple effect. Because I want people to feel cared about, and as if they have a solution. I want anxiety to be reduced, a waves of relief to take place. I want to know that I can make that happen.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a high school student (I've done twelve years of school). I love learning about other cultures, and traveling. Maybe I'll come see you someday!

lender.loan_because: We have travelled to other countries and I know that we are blessed as a family and by having the chance to operate a successful business.

lender.loan_because: i want to help :)
lender.occupational_info: i go to school to learn :)

lender.occupational_info: I am an Internet Business Consultant helping people to succeed in their online home business providing them with all the tools they need incl free Pathway To Success Ezine published since 2000 every other Sunday to over 138,000 subscribers in 94 countries.

lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in someones business and their families. My dad has his own engineering factory. I think its great to be able to help others do the same thing.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student currently doing a Bachelor of International Studies with a focus on development studies

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: Even when we have the ability and the motivation to start a business, it can be very difficult, or even impossible, without some external help. Hope my loan can help others to improve their quality of living.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a software developer on a Portuguese Company.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I know what it means to build up something from nothing. Therefor I want to give someone else this opportunity.

lender.loan_because: we're all in this together

lender.name: Suzann and Jim
lender.loan_because: "to those to whom much have been given, much is expected"

lender.name: Hemant & Trisha
lender.loan_because:
In my small way I want to empower others to change their lives for the better and lift themselves and their families out of the never ending circle of poverty, hoplessness and despair.
Don't think about helping someone else, DO IT!
lender.occupational_info: I help individuals and businesses plan their financial futures and secure their families through investments and insurance.

lender.name: Eleanor
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others become successful in their work.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Walid
lender.loan_because: I help people who are less fortunate and sometimes cannot afford to find a loaf of bread, if everybody shares his wealth, we will be a much better place.

lender.name: Hilton Family
lender.loan_because: Our family would like to bless others as we have been blessed by our loving and faithful Savior, Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Ed
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is a superb concept.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because:
I can. I loan because it's the right thing to do.
There's a certain resopnsability that comes with living in the richest country on earth.
There are people across the globe surviving each year on what we spend at Starbucks....
Shame on us if we fail to see that. Shame on us if we fail to act!

lender.name: Maggie
lender.occupational_info: I teach 2nd grade (7-8 year old children).

lender.name: Cayman
lender.loan_because: Every one has a right to earn a living to do their best to support themselves and their families. We all need a little help to make that happen sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I currently train counselors who are working with substance abuse clients at high risk for contracting HIV.
